item.title: MRF, JK Tyre to CEAT: Tyre stocks skyrocket up to 6% today; here's why

review.headline_rewrite: MRF, JK Tyre to CEAT: Tyre stocks skyrocket up to 6% today; here's why
bullets: Shares of tyre making companies rose up to 6 per cent in Tuesday's trading session after the government's announced GST reforms on August 15.
JK Tyre & Industries share price leading among the gainers jumped nearly 6 per cent on September 2.
Meanwhile, MRF and CEAT shares were trading 5 per cent up.
